website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful, chunky, and classic stainless steel watch that goes with any ensemble.
pros: A larger face makes it easy to read the time
cons: This watch can be a bit large on women with smaller wrists

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, but not for us
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife who was looking a larger watch. Unfortunately, she found it to be a bit masculine in design and look so we returned it for a full refund. She tends to wear slimmer bracelets and watches so I should have known better ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nick Cepparulo

customer_reviews.title: One Of The best Watches
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking at this watch for quite some time before I finally bought it and it was one of the best buys on Amazon for me. The shipping was only $5 and it arrived before the estimated arrival date. I've had the watch for about two weeks now and even after banging it against a desk once or twice, there are absolutely no scratches and it is in amazing condition. By far one of my favorite watches I own.
customer_reviews.author: Calla Paprzycki

customer_reviews.title: ... adjustment the bracelet is kind of big but it's beautiful and the prices👍 are good
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch just need adjustment the bracelet is kind of big but it's beautiful and the prices👍 are good.
customer_reviews.author: RMM

customer_reviews.title: Very styley!
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid and heavy watch. Discreet until you actually look at it
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant at first when I purchased this gift for my wife, but when the watch arrived, it was as advertised. Great looking watch, functioning timing components, and nice packaging. Of course links had to be removed to fit her wrist, but that is an easy job to perform with the right tools. For the price, it was a heck of a deal. I would definitely recommend this watch for those guys out there that want/need a gift to woo their significant other.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Allen

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend watch with a feminine look!  LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this watch!! Great solid watch for a great price!! Comfortable on considering its size too! If you want that "boyfriend watch" look but still a watch with a feminine look then this is the watch for you! Goes great with both casual and dressy attire. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Blockhead77

customer_reviews.title: Good looking peice!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this watch. I wanted a watch for every day and this is perfect. The brushed stainless steel will hide the enivitabable daily wear. It is a smart and professional looking piece.
customer_reviews.author: NRG589

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! This is my third Marc Jacobs watch, and wont be my last. Looks beautiful, lovely to wear and I get plenty of compliments when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Batey

customer_reviews.title: Super trendy.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch! I love that it also provides the day of the month. The watch is perfect for work and going out.
customer_reviews.author: armcandy671

customer_reviews.title: Elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch. It looks very elegant on my wrist. The price was very good too. I highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Jay

customer_reviews.title: Classy watch for a classy lady!
customer_reviews.text: This is a big beautiful classy watch! Had to get two links removed! I know I will get the compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Cheeky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Watch is great condition and true to size and look! Delivered on exact day that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Nacewa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch only thing is that it was too big ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch only thing is that it was too big for my wrist had to get a couple of links taken off but besides that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as anniversary gift for the wifey
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful looking watch. I bought it for my wife and she loved it. It was our 3rd yeard anniversary - I gave it to her along with a Tiffanys bracelet, which was way more expensive :( - We had seen it at Macy's for a highger retail price, but then I saw it on Amazon I went for it and bought it for way less. It was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: If you're thinking about buying...do it!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt, service was wonderful and I got exactly what I paid for...couldn't be happier! The watch has all original plastics and is perfect. I was debating between this one and the mk5076, since I have it in gold, but I'm so happy I opted for this one instead. Good looking watch...thanks Dexclusive!
customer_reviews.author: Arleen Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking watch. The shipping was very quick. Very pleased over all.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: CAME QUICK AND SUPER NICE FOR THE PRICE OFF COURSE HAD TO REMOVE SOME LINKS BUT ALL WATCHES YOU HAVE TO DO THAT
customer_reviews.author: marina

customer_reviews.title: I'm not comfortable to wear it or just maybe my wrist is ...
customer_reviews.text: I had it returned. This qatch is for the women wrist. It it thick, too big and heavy. I'm not comfortable to wear it or just maybe my wrist is too small like a thin 13 year old teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Yamada

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I thought it would be but I love it. Classy enough to dress up and casual for every day.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece
customer_reviews.text: I love this and receive numerous compliments when I wear it!!! Would recommend this and looks good with any outfit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Q

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and the recipient was floored by it. It's beautiful and functional, what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Laker Fan #1,004,948,362,274,380

customer_reviews.title: its a nice watch but soon as i got to put it ...
customer_reviews.text: its a nice watch but soon as i got to put it on one of the screws were to lose for it and it broke so i had to go and fix it so they can put a bigger screw
customer_reviews.author: julissa torred

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this watch.. It's really a unique thing.. Thanks..
customer_reviews.author: Varditer Grigoryan

customer_reviews.title: sexy classic time piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch in person. Very classy and a good weight for a womans watch. I would give it 20 stars if I could...
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Raposa

customer_reviews.title: It is a chriistmas present and it looks perfect.
customer_reviews.text: it arrived in time. It is a chriistmas present and it looks perfect. Monica
customer_reviews.author: Monica Kyvåg

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved the watch. It was her choice for a Christmas present and it hit the nail on the head. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch - great price- very light and comfortable - Love It
customer_reviews.author: Tatjana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have Invictas but this one is definitely the best!
customer_reviews.author: Gia Reyes

customer_reviews.title: chunky
customer_reviews.text: I personally love chunky metal watches, and this was no exception. It's chunky and looks just like on the pic. Easily added to any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Queen K

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I just adore my watch. I gave my Movado a rest and wear the Marc Jacobs just about everyday. It's so classy and can be wore with everything...LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: SRG

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL WATCH
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend absolutely loves it! I gave it to her for her birthday and she wears it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Big Vee

customer_reviews.title: Love my watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch!!!! I was concerned it wouldn't look as good, but it looks amazing! I need a golden one now ;)
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

product_meta.title: Marc by Marc Jacobs Women's MBM3100 Blade Silver Watch
product_meta.description:
DIAL TYPE Analog DIAL COLOR White C RYSTAL Scratch Resistant Sapphire HANDS Silver-toned SUB DIALS Three - 60 Second, 60 Minute and 24 Hour BAND TYPE Bracelet BAND MATERIAL Stainless Steel CLASP Fold Over with Safety Release WATER RESISTANCE 30 meters / 100 feet CALENDAR Date display between 4 and 5 o'clock position FUNCTIONS Chronograph, Date, Hour, Minute, Second Stainless Steel CASE SIZE 40 mm CASE THICKNESS 12 mm CASE MATERIAL Stainless Steel CROWN Pull / Push CASE SHAPE Round CASE BACK Solid BEZEL Fixed Stainless Steel Imported; Made in China Shipping Note: Shipping to Alaska, Hawaii, PO Boxes and APO addresses not available for this item



Marc by Marc Jacobs Watches Marc by Marc Jacobs:

 VIBRANT AND FRESH, THE MARC BY MARC JACOBS COLLECTION REPRESENTS THE BOLD SPIRIT OF THE BRAND. THE WATCH COLLECTION OFFERS AN EXCITING ENTRY INTO THE WORLD OF Marc by Marc Jacobs WITH AN ENERGETIC AND UNEXPECTED POINT OF VIEW. 



The Blade Chrono Watch is a stainless steel chronograph with three eyes, a subtle etched logo top ring, and a tri-fold buckle with spring-lock closure. A silver-tone dial with clear glitz hour markers completes the look.
